passage_text: When Does Menopause Start? Menopause is the point in time (not a period of time) when a woman has gone for 12 months without her menstrual period. This signals that she has passed her child bearing years and that her ovarian eggs have been depleted. Menopause takes place at the age of 51, although it may be much earlier or later for some women.
